sources.title: Me (aka I) 2016 Soheil Beiraghi (2)
sources.description: Directed by Soheil Beiraghi (Iran, 2016, 84 min.). In Persian with English subtitles. DCP. Azar (Leila Hatami) lives a double life. Most know her as a respectable young music teacher, but to make ends meet, she delivers illicit goods, like forged passports and papers, to those who require them. When a series of events brings Leila’s small-time operation under scrutiny, she must fight for her reputation and freedom. This high-stakes drama is writer-director Soheil Beiraghi’s first feature film, and offers an outstanding performance by Hatami.
